trends: There has been one other sighting in Dennis
There were no other sightings in Dennis on or around May 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy relative was on the front deck of the cottage talking on the cellphone and yelled to me and my wife to get out side to see this orange light streaking overhead. It came from the south going north west. It was moving fast and flickering. It only lasted about 7-8 seconds and faded out. We waited about a minute and started back in when another one appeared just as bright going on the same path as the first one that appeared and faded away. Both went in the same perfectly straight path. Both times there was no sound. Nobody was out on the street and there are no street lamps on our street. We new right away that it was not a plane as they don't have orange lights and there was no sound and we are not near an airplane approach or flight path.
Summary: Bright Orange spheres came from south to north west for a short distance
